(CNN)Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger has been placed on the reserve/Covid-19 list and will miss Sunday's game at home against the Detroit Lions, the team announced Saturday.

articles.title: Pro Football Hall of Famer Sam Huff dies at 87
articles.description: Pro Football Hall of Famer and former Washington and New York Giants linebacker Sam Huff died Saturday, Washington Football Team owner Daniel Snyder said in a statement.
articles.content:
(CNN)Pro Football Hall of Famer and former Washington and New York Giants linebacker Sam Huff died Saturday, Washington Football Team owner Daniel Snyder said in a statement.
